lead_paragraph: RUBEN--Larry. Both friend and family. He will always be remembered as a dedicated and encouraging father. By example, he inspired his children to lead lives of charity and integrity. His unwavering principles built an imitable business. Our heartfelt condolences to his devoted children and loving wife Jan. Diane Belfer & Family 1/3
